title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 210.43 - Powers of clerks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 210.43 - Powers of clerks

State Regulations

In accordance with UCCA 105(a), the following
shall each have the power to administer oaths, take acknowledgments and sign
the process or mandate of the court: (a) clerks; (b) deputy clerks; (c) assistant clerks; (d) any other nonjudicial person
designated by order of the Chief Administrator of the Courts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
210.43

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
